title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but in expression builder, the old column names are shown when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking the first column name, the original name of the column is listed below in the expression builder, but the alias name 'row["column1"]' appears above after double-clicking the original name.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name 'row["column1"]' should be displayed instead of the original column name, as specified in SCR 78193.
SR:
To reproduce: 1. Open the expression builder
2. Select the dataset
3. Double-click the first column name
4. Observe that the alias name 'row["column1"]' should be displayed instead of the original column name
